item.title: How To Set, Change, and Recover Your MySQL Root Password
item.description:
If you never set, forgot, or change your MySQL password, you’re in luck. This article walks you through these steps, so you’ll never be at a loss for that database root user password.

item.title: Microsoft to Invest $80 Billion in AI Data Centers in Fiscal 2025
item.description:
More than half of the investment has been earmarked for infrastructure in the U.S. Microsoft President Brad Smith frames AI investment as key to economic growth.
